com.facebook.infrastructure.io
Interface IFileReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
SequenceFile.AbstractReader, SequenceFile.BufferReader, SequenceFile.MemoryMappedReader, SequenceFile.Reader
public interface IFileReader

Interface to read from the SequenceFile abstraction. Author : Avinash Lakshman ( alakshman@facebook.com) & Prashant Malik ( pmalik@facebook.com )

readDirect

void readDirect(byte[] bytes)
                throws java.io.IOException
Be extremely careful while using this API. This currently used to read the commit log header from the commit logs. Treat this as an internal API.

Parameters:
bytes - read into this byte array.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

touch

long touch(java.lang.String key,
           boolean fData)
           throws java.io.IOException
This functions is used to help out subsequent reads on the specified key. It reads the keys prior to this one on disk so that the buffer cache is hot.

Parameters:
key - key for which we are performing the touch.
fData - true implies we fetch the data into buffer cache.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getPositionFromBlockIndex

long getPositionFromBlockIndex(java.lang.String key)
                               throws java.io.IOException
This method helps is retrieving the offset of the specified key in the file using the block index.

Parameters:
key - key whose position we need in the block index.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getBlockMetadata

com.facebook.infrastructure.io.SSTable.BlockMetadata getBlockMetadata(java.lang.String key)
                                                                      throws java.io.IOException
This method returns the position of the specified key and the size of its data segment from the block index.

Parameters:
key - key whose block metadata we are interested in.
Returns:
an instance of the block metadata for this key.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

next

long next(java.lang.String key,
          DataOutputBuffer bufOut,
          java.lang.String column)
          throws java.io.IOException
This method dumps the next key/value into the DataOuputStream passed in.

Parameters:
key - key we are interested in.
dos - DataOutputStream that needs to be filled.
column - name of the column in our format.
Returns:
number of bytes that were read.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

next

long next(java.lang.String key,
          DataOutputBuffer bufOut,
          java.lang.String columnFamilyName,
          java.util.List<java.lang.String> columnNames)
          throws java.io.IOException
This method dumps the next key/value into the DataOuputStream passed in. Always use this method to query for application specific data as it will have indexes.

Parameters:
key - - key we are interested in.
dos - - DataOutputStream that needs to be filled.
cfName - - The name of the column family only without the ":"
columnNames - - The list of columns in the cfName column family that we want to return
Returns:
number of bytes read.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

close

void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
Close the file after reading.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
